item.title: This hospice has a bold new mission: saving lives
item.description: A hospice in Uganda asked itself: Can we do more than ease the pain of dying? Can we actually prevent deaths from cervical and breast cancer?

item.title: Critics say 'talk to your doc' requirement for some vaccines causes confusion

item.title: Trump health care plan doesn't help people facing skyrocketing ACA premiums

item.title: 24 hours of chaos as mental health grants are slashed then restored
item.description: For 24 hours, it was unclear which mental health and addiction programs would survive and who would still have jobs when the dust settled.

item.title: This country taxes menstrual pads as luxury goods. She's aiming to end the tax
